titlestmt.titleproper: Henry Luce Foundation records, Michael Gilligan Presidential Files
A Guide to the Henry Luce Foundation records, Michael Gilligan Presidential Files FA1724

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2024-10-01 04:55:37 UTC.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.unittitle: Henry Luce Foundation records, Michael Gilligan Presidential Files

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research with select materials restricted as noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC. Researchers interested in accessing digital media (floppy disks, CDs, DVDs, etc.) in this collection must use an access surrogate. The original items may not be accessed because of preservation concerns. Access copy currently unavailable. Please contact a RAC archivist for further instruction.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: RAC holds legal title. The Henry Luce Foundation retains all applicable intellectual property rights in so far as it holds them.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The Henry Luce Foundation records, Michael Gilligan Presidential Files are arranged as received:

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Henry Luce Foundation records, Michael Gilligan Presidential Files contain correspondence, presentation, speeches, and reports. Major topics include theological education and philanthropy, with an emphasis on non-profits and their relationships with colleges and universities.
